name: Bitminer (Will R.)
description:
Bitminer is a sandbox style mining game set during the silver rush of the late 19th century.  The objective? Mine as much silver as possible and get rich! 

Environment assets by Mana Seed: https://seliel-the-shaper.itch.io/gentle-forest

Game sprites by JTR: https://www.instagram.com/joshtrainey/

Music: 

royalty free Music by Giorgio Di Campo for @FreeSound Music
